abstract: Mariusz Kwiecien, the Polish baritone who was cast in the title role of the Metropolitan Opera's new production of "Don Giovanni," which opens on Thursday night, underwent surgery for a herniated disk on Tuesday, his manager said.
snippet: Mariusz Kwiecien, the Polish baritone who was cast in the title role of the Metropolitan Opera's new production of "Don Giovanni," which opens on Thursday night, underwent surgery for a herniated disk on Tuesday, his manager said.

headline.main: Baritone in 'Don Giovanni' Taken to Hospital
